channel.title: Tanzu SQL on ModernApps Ninja Home
channel.description: Recent content in Tanzu SQL on ModernApps Ninja Home

item.title: Deploying Tanzu SQL to Tanzu Kubernetes Grid Clusters
item.description: This is a demonstration of how to get Tanzu SQL configured utilising Tanzu Kubernetes Grid clusters, to provide a relational database-as-a-service function.
